column4: man. I hate all these "alternative" bittorrent clients like Azureus
they harm the network and try to make a bad edonkey out of it. great...
for one thing, they allow multiple downloads
this is possible with the original client as well, but much more different
some people have an upload so high (my brother has 1 mga on upload) that even when downloading multiple files, he is still the one uploading the most
well? I guess most people do multiple torrents when it's much easier
less then 1% of the bittorrent crowd has such an upstream I guess :)
you ran a tracker or something?
as I said, so they are just doing bad things to themselves IMHO
so what will happen if usenet for warez gets popular?
there is IRC channels too, XDCC thing
well u can copy/past and u can try to understand what that means
but you can also copy & paste and don't do it... that's my point
ok but when I do it, i try to understand what that means
I just think many guys install LFS by simple copy&pasting because its cool and l33t
I came to linux in part because i wanted to be in control,so LFS is just one more step in that direction
that's perfectly ok. I guess you don't use an LFS system anymore, though?
well not yet, i'm using linux for only like 2 months...
